channel.title: Projects on Julien Vitay
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Julien Vitay

item.title: ANNarchy
item.description: ANNarchy (Artificial Neural Networks architect) is a general-purpose parallel neuro-simulator for rate-coded or spiking neural networks.

item.title: Deep Learning
item.description: Deep neural networks and their applications to emotion recognition, attention, sensor fusion…

item.title: Dopaminergic system
item.description: Modeling the dopaminergic system (VTA, SNc), its afferences and its influence on the basal ganglia, prefrontal cortex and hippocampus.
